Files in this packageÂ¶

abce/abce:
the actual ABCE engine, you have to import the modules in this directory
abce/template:
a template from which you can start writing your own simulation including start.py, agents and parameter files
abce/examples:
a series of example simulations
abce/unitest:
Unit testing is a way to ensure that your software works as specified. The unit test simulation ensures, that all functions of the simulation and the agent’s base classes work correctly.
abce/doc:
The documentation source code.
